attributes.title: Say Yes to Responsibility, and No to Obligation
attributes.description:
Short video taken from Q&A session of Conquering Time, 6 March 2016. In this video, Nithyananda talks about responsibility and obligation, and how they are two completely different concepts. He defines obligation and asks his viewers to remove all obligations from their life. And instead, to run their life by taking responsibility.

Especially in relationships, feeling obligated is a very destructive force. Because you will always take revenge on whomever you feel is demanding from you from inside out. Mature relationships are relationships without obligations, even in marriage.
